name: Fish Rage
description:
This is a small game made for the Wowie Jam 4.0, hosted by Jonas Tyroller.

In the game, you control a school of fish, trying to avoid being eaten by sharks!

Eat plankton to grow the gang and improve the chance of survival!

Playable with a controller using:

Left analog for controlling the school of fish.

XBOX B or Dual Shock Circle to eat plankton.

XBOX A or Dual Shock X to activate spread out ability.
